item.title: Maluma Pauses Concert to Scold Mother Who Brought Her Baby Without Ear Protection: ‘For The Next Time, Be a Bit More Aware’
item.description: Maluma stopped his Mexico City concert over the weekend to scold a mother who brought her young child to the show without ear protection. The performance was part of the final leg of the artist’
